name: Aurelia Release Notes - Mid August 2017
description: Today, we have a small set of release to update you with. We're gearing up for some big releases next. Stay tuned for more...
content:
Today, we have a small set of release to update you with. We're gearing up for some big releases next. Stay tuned for more...

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance improvements.

### aurelia-webpack-plugin 2.0.0-rc.3

#### Features

* support Webpack 3 ModuleConcatenationPlugin
* support resources inside @inlineView

#### Bug Fixes

* recognize router-view attributes
* better control over entry sequence
* chunk not supported by ModuleDependenciesPlugin
* no default entrypoint with DLLPlugin
* use browser-pal for electron-renderer (#100)

### aurelia-ux 0.3.0

#### Features

* expose style engine ([f623c70](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/f623c70)), closes [#73](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/issues/73)
* add ux-list control (#82) ([ee64238](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/ee64238))
* add unchecked value ([88505d9](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/88505d9)), closes [#69](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/issues/69)

#### Bug Fixes

* disabled checkbox behavior (#80) ([32eb94c](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/32eb94c))
* bundle all files with aurelia-cli ([c69c1ff](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/c69c1ff)), closes [#17](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/issues/17)
* add disable button behavior (#76) ([a16f47f](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/a16f47f))
* remove quotes ([66966e4](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/commit/66966e4))

## Patch Releases

Patch updates include only fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-i18n 1.6.2](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/compare/1.6.1...v1.6.2)

#### Bug Fixes

* Don't try to parse translation json if already parsed.

### aurelia-protractor-plugin 1.0.5

#### Features

* add i18n locators

#### Bug Fixes

* loadAndWaitForAureliaPage wasn't looking for aurelia object
* re-setup after every test in case restartBrowserBetweenTests is enabled
* update @types/selenium-webdriver
